title: 180 is max
creator_credit: Bill Pettigrew, Robert Verrall and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The twenty-third world championship match for builders of free-flight model aircraft, held at Goteborg, Sweden, in July 1971, in which a Canadian team competed. The film follows the successful flights and the failures, as competitors attempt to get their fragile handmade craft airborne by whatever means. (Award: Milan)
